title: Lf decent Flex players high plat/diamond
body: hey guys :) looking for decent people for a flex group i have we will play most nights of the week looking to push this season last season we got to diamond  and are looking to push past that this season so if u are keen and are above the age of 18+ plz add me in game Monstêr <---- copy paste it coz of the funny e and also my discord is Monster#3243 thankx {{champion:105}}
